sourcesContent: import React from "react" import FileUploader from "../../shared/FileUploader" import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import usePreviewImg from "../../hooks/usePreviewImg" import { useState,useRef } from "react"; import { Button } from "@mui/material"; import fileupload from "../../assets/icons/file-upload.svg" export default function PostForm() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [title, setTitle] = useState(""); const [desc, setDesc] = useState(""); const [link, setLink] = useState(""); const imageRef = useRef(null); const { handleImageChange, selectedFile, setSelectedFile } = usePreviewImg(); const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ event.preventDefault(); } return (
